Hi [firstname],

It’s January, you’re back at the office, and it’s “full steam ahead” for 2018. Amidst all the planning and projects, employee training is a challenge that usually resurfaces around this time of year. And if your team doesn’t have a structured learning program in place, it can be tricky knowing where to start.

If you’re in the early stages of formulating a plan, check out our Technical Training Program Worksheet. It’s a handy resource for organizing and collecting info and to sharing with your stakeholders—managers, HR, and learners alike!
